trans-unit.source: Setting a custom domain name is only available for the **Shared**, **Basic** and **Standard** modes for Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: Setting a custom domain name is only available for the **Shared**, **Basic** and **Standard** modes for Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: Before switching a web app from the **Free** mode to the **Shared**, **Basic** or **Standard** mode, you must first remove spending caps in place for your Web Apps subscription.
trans-unit.target: Before switching a web app from the **Free** mode to the **Shared**, **Basic** or **Standard** mode, you must first remove spending caps in place for your Web Apps subscription.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the App Service plan modes, including how to change the mode of your site, see [How to scale web apps](../articles/app-service-web/web-sites-scale.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on the App Service plan modes, including how to change the mode of your site, see [How to scale web apps](../articles/app-service-web/web-sites-scale.md).
